meanings.definition: To be excessively proud or arrogant.
meanings.sent1: She overweened about her accomplishments, thinking she was better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: He overweened after winning the competition, boasting about his victory to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat overweened as if it owned the entire house, strutting around like a king.
meanings.sent4: His overweened attitude was like a dark cloud, casting a shadow over the room.
meanings.sent5: The overweened peacock flaunted its feathers, showing off its beauty to all.

meanings.definition: To have an excessive opinion of oneself.
meanings.sent1: They overweened their abilities, believing they could accomplish anything they set their minds to.
meanings.sent2: She overweened so much that she refused to listen to anyone else's advice.
meanings.sent3: The overweened child thought he was the smartest in the class, but struggled with simple math problems.
meanings.sent4: His overweened ego was like a bubble waiting to burst.
meanings.sent5: The overweened actor demanded special treatment on set, thinking he was above everyone else.
